description:
nova volume-list does not display attachments

Steps to reproduce:

> Launch Instance
> Create Volume
> Attach volume
> nova volume-list

Expected:

server uuid for attachment shown

Actual:


$ nova volume-list
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID | Status |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 1  | in-use | myvol-c07a2116 | 1    | None        | None        |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
